text.snapper.empty: Take a screenshot in-game to see it here!
text.snapper.panorama_encourage: Take a panorama in-game to see it here!
text.snapper.panorama_failure_iris: Due to a bug in Iris, panoramas cannot be taken while it's installed.
text.snapper.delete_question: Are you sure you want to delete this screenshot?
text.snapper.delete_warning: '%s' will be lost forever! (A long time!)
text.snapper.screenshot_failure_open: Take a screenshot in order to view it!
config.snapper.snapper.title: Snapper Settings
config.snapper.snapper.copyTakenScreensh: Copy screenshot to clipboard when taken
config.snapper.snapper.showSnapperTitleS: Show Snapper button on title screen
config.snapper.snapper.showSnapperGameMe: Show Snapper button in game menu
config.snapper.snapper.viewMode.tooltip: Show screenshot menu with grid or list
toast.snapper.upload.success.description: A link to the uploaded image has been copied to your clipboard.
snapper.privacy_notice.description: Image uploading in Snapper is powered by AxolotlClient. Therefore, this feature is subject to AxolotlClient's terms which you will have to accept in order to upload images. This decision can be updated or changed at any time.
toast.snapper.upload.axolotlclient.api_d: You didn't accept AxolotlClient's terms, therefore image uploading isn't available.
